about.title: About
about.name: Florian GIURGIU
about.intro: Passionate about web development and new technologies, I create modern and high-performance digital solutions.
about.paragraph1: Hello, my name is Florian Giurgiu, a final-year engineering student at Télécom Saint-Étienne and currently on an Erasmus exchange at the University of Padua in Italy. Passionate about Artificial Intelligence, Computer Vision, and Software Development, I enjoy designing and experimenting with innovative solutions that combine mathematics, programming, and creativity.
about.paragraph2: Curious and persevering, I am equally interested in deep learning (Deep Learning, Neural Networks, Optimization) and full-stack development to bring concrete projects to life. I have had the opportunity to work on various projects: image detection and matching using Deep Learning, developing interactive applications in Java and Qt, as well as creating modern websites with React and Tailwind CSS.
about.paragraph3: Beyond my studies, I am passionate about bodybuilding and handball, and I have been playing guitar for several years. I also enjoy getting involved in associative life, particularly through organizing E-Sport and cultural events. I speak French and Romanian fluently, and I also have a good level of English (B2), as well as notions in Spanish (A2) and German (A1).
about.paragraph4: My goal is to put my skills to use in ambitious and innovative projects, where I can learn, share, and have a positive impact.

portfolio.subtitle: Engineering Student • AI & Development
portfolio.description: Final-year student at Télécom Saint‑Étienne (on exchange in Padua), passionate about AI, computer vision, and development. Projects: deep learning (object detection/image matching), Java/Qt apps, React/Tailwind websites. Curious and committed, I seek ambitious projects to learn and make an impact.
